entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
